channel.title: [PI] Special Command Help
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I wanna add a ::help command for players -Im New In PI.
::help
Sends a message to staff That player: (playername) Needs ur HELP! do ::helpzone.
Then the player who did ::help got automaticly teled to the Helpzone Theres the staff waiting for him to help.
- I hope u guys can understand Im New In PI n not rly good in english.
-Greetz

item.title: [PI] Special Command Help
